website_summaries.verdict: A top choice for those who need a belt for casual or dress situations that won't sag under the weight of a firearm.
pros: Works as a simple dress belt
Thick, heavy-duty leather holds up to tough use
cons: Check sizing as you may need to order a full size larger than your regular pants size

customer_reviews.title: Initial impression of this belt are very good. The leather is VERY thick
customer_reviews.text: Initial impression of this belt is very good. The leather is VERY thick, but is flexible. The belt holds a full size 1911 holster in both iwb and owb styles with spare mag pouches with no problem. There is zero sagging. The apppearance of the belt is also very good. It is darkly dyed black- and is very uniform in appearance. This belt new is almost good enough to be used as a dress belt. So this thing has a 100 year warranty? Challenge accepted!
customer_reviews.author: David L Schroerlucke

customer_reviews.title: Stop searching. Just buy!
customer_reviews.text: First off the quality of this belt is top notch. Well put together. Thick but not so thick its uncomfortable holds all my holsters well without a problem. Then you have the warranty just another + in this belts colomn. Lastly you have the customer service. Its top notch truly exceptional. I cant say enough good things. My belt was a little small for my IWB holster and they sent me a new one with a envelope to send back the first one free of charge. Seriously if your looking for a gun belt thats not nylon and not ridiculously priced look no further!! Im not affiliated with Hanks in anyway i just really like this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Belt
customer_reviews.text: It's been a while since I've had a real leather belt. It's well worth the price and way better than any box store belt. Customer service is great, they contacted me to see if I was happy and promptly processed a size exchange without question. I used the size chart, however I still needed a size smaller. It's very comfortable and holds well even with a IWB Holster and one of the best things about this belt, it's Made in America!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: This is not a sturdy gun belt. This is a substandard piece of leather that seemed to want to deform as soon as I pulled it out of the package. It is fine as a belt, but I have seen the same or even better quality for less. I would never think of wearing a gun while wearing this belt. I am returning it immediately. Never worn.
customer_reviews.author: Darric A Lengling

customer_reviews.title: Great belt!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace my work belt. At least 3x as thick as the Carhartt belt it's replacing. Craftsmanship is very high and is a good looking belt. Don't know if it'll be sturdy enough for CCW, but I'll be finding out sure enough. Didn't feel like i was wearing a hula hoop around me which is how my Kore belt feels.
customer_reviews.author: Sean P. Butterfield

customer_reviews.title: Size is true, excellent belt!
customer_reviews.text: This belt size was PERFECT! Holes ahead and behind of how it fit. I love the fact the seller suggested belt size associated with pant size, was right on! This belt is thick!! But not too stiff to be comfortable. Looking forward to never needing to replace this belt as I carry everyday and have a 1911 half the year. I already split one thick genuine leather belt of lesser quality, so I am anxious to see if this lasts like they promise!
customer_reviews.author: Don E.

customer_reviews.title: Great for cc
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this belt awhile now, wanted to make sure it held up before posting and it hasn’t let me down yet. I conceal and the steel reinforcement inside it keeps everything where I put it without being bulky or uncomfortable from over tightening a standard leather belt. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Nice Belt
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to find a belt made from an actual piece of hide. Not just pieces or bonded glued together.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff H.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GUN BELT
customer_reviews.text: Awesome belt I received it a day earlier than expected tried it on and it fit perfectly there are a few more holes in it than normal belts so you have a wide range of size adjustment I would say 4-5 inches, this belt is heavy as in solid leather heavy well made and I can tell it will last for many years the buckle is heavy duty as well also sized well for the width of the belt and overall well worth the money. I plan on buying a brown one next month just need to find brown clips for my IWB holster so the black ones don't stand out with a tucked in shirt. Great job Hanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe ICAMO

customer_reviews.title: Gunner Belt!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice belt. I've been wearing it for almost a week now and it's been a great addition for my EDC setup. I typically carry either a S&W MP Shield or a HK P30SK and it's great for either of those. I thought the belt would be a little thicker and have some additional rigidity but it certainly works fine. Definitely a great option if you are looking for a good gun belt.
customer_reviews.author: Bill BTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Great belt, great service for loads less than others.
customer_reviews.text: This belt is fantastic! Does not stretch throughout the day. Keeps your holster close to your body reducing print. Belt holes and hardware all perfect. The leather is heavy and does not bend against clips. Best belt ever. Apparently some Amish quality thing going on there... Additionally, the belt i purchased fit (per the size guide) but I like my belts a little long... They sent me out a replacement the same day I contacted them along with a return postal envelope. Really great service.
customer_reviews.author: rayray snell

customer_reviews.title: Great gun belt.
customer_reviews.text: Great belt so far, but sizing is way off unless I am getting much bigger. I'm size 36 and Forty from Hanks only gives me one hole to grow. But great quality. I think the stiffness of the belt is why I have length issues but still fits great and even if I grow a little it has plenty of belt to adapt to . Drill another hole or so on.. I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan brett Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Belt sagged after 2 months of wear
customer_reviews.text: This belt sagged after 2 months of wear. I'm disappointed, especially as this belt is advertised. It's just regular leather belt. Deforms and sags same way as general leather belt but for a higher price tag. I'll try their kydex reinforced belt, hope it will work better
customer_reviews.author: Denis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent belt. My wife bought another brand it too ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent belt. My wife bought another brand it too was made in the United States. I prefer this one over it since is one piece instead of the two piece one she bought. That one is stitched together over time I believe the stitching will fail. So that one is now the one I wear for work. Hanks is well made and good for going out or for use to hold your pistol. Overall I would recommend this belt to anyone looking for a quality American made belt.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth R. White

customer_reviews.title: Best belt hands down on the market
customer_reviews.text: WOW this belt is by far the best belt I’ve ever put on!! Unbelievable craftsmanship strong and sturdy... I full Time carry my HK 9mm. And it’s the perfect belt for the job I don’t even fee my gun! I will definitely be ordering more belts in the future totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: I am 100% satisfied with the belt is it arrived promptly and exactly ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 100% satisfied with the belt is it arrived promptly and exactly as described in the description. If fully supports the weight of my sidearm without any feeling like it's going to fail. It's a very sturdy and strong and it feels very quality made.
customer_reviews.author: James Helwick

customer_reviews.title: gives support
customer_reviews.text: I like the belt overall. It is real leather and feels it. The only thing I am worried about is the buckle as it appears to be made out of a cheap feeling metal. No failures but just feels less than what I would expect. I would buy again if needed but don't think I will live past 100. haha
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Lemon

customer_reviews.title: What a fantastic belt. The pictures on Amazon doesnt give it ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! What a fantastic belt. The pictures on Amazon doesnt give it any justice. This a truly a guys, guys Gun Belt. Awesome quality grade of leather. Very thick and substantial. The rivets are high quality as well. I'm a 36 waist and their suggestion to get the size 40 was spot on. Great fit, perfect for my IWB holster. Keeps my draw firm, smooth and steady. Very satisfied with my purchase. This is not the kind of belt you pick up at the Mall.
customer_reviews.author: Gfam

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great belt just beware it’s quite thick which isn’t a bad thing but in the front buckle where it goes over itself it sticks out quite a bit. Otherwise this belt is built extremely well! I use it to conceal carry a M&P Shield in a Black Hawk holster and it holds it rock solid.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Lark

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing Belt
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect belt for its intended use. Super high quality. The little known tidbit is that it is a beautify dress belt as well with silver hardware. You can wear this to the office. No question about it. With a suit. With jeans. It fits every situation. And the customer service is incredible. They follow up to make sure you loved everything (I did) and looks like they stand behind it completely. I will be buying another belt from them. Or two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job!
customer_reviews.text: The belt is awesome, customer service is right there with it. I’ve had it for just under 3months and it still feels the same as day 1. I changed the buckle because it’s really short (1-1/2”) and makes the belt protrude since it’s a pretty thick. I swapped it out for a brass red wing buckle I previously used (2”). All in all, great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gofast

customer_reviews.title: Fit Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black belt first. I liked it so much I ordered a brown one a couple days later. I wear size 35-36 pants. I ordered a 40 belt and it fit perfectly as I'm using the middle hole. I already own a CCW belt so I brought these primarily as good sturdy leather belts to wear with jeans and Khaki pants. I like these because while they will hold a firearm, they are not overly stiff like the belts reinforced with Kydex. I think these belts will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: FJ

customer_reviews.title: Solid, sturdy. Excellent craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.text: You can go cheap if you want but as the old saying goes. You get what you pay for... This bel is solid as can be. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Alan McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy belt
customer_reviews.text: Very good. I recommend to follow size instruction. One size more than my waist fits without CCW; two sizes more will fit better in any case. I have it from some months and it is perfect. I wonder if it still 100 year, but I wish to check personally. See you in 2119.
customer_reviews.author: MidoriSumiRoma

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Quality - Attractive Belt - Nicely Packaged and Presented!
customer_reviews.text: First I must state that I do not Generally write reviews. I am a massive Amazon user, with hundreds of purchases a year, but no reviews. I am very pleased with the Belt, as an amateur Leather worker myself, I can attest to the quality, workmanship and nice packaging. I am not sure if the description states it, but the belt arrived with both Silver and Gold Hardware, so you can choose which to wear, easily change back and forth, or save one for the future if within the 100 year warranty it wears out! I will be ordering the stitched version of the belt very soon!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kent

customer_reviews.title: Get belt for CCW
customer_reviews.text: This belt is sturdy enough to carry my Kimber 1911 and CZ SP 75 -01 full size pistols. Great style as well!
customer_reviews.author: SoCal Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints with my Hanks belt, it is an awesome product! I just wish i had not listened to the reviews on sizing. it was suggested to go up two sizes to accommodate for my CCW, I feel like I would have been fine with my actual waist size
customer_reviews.author: leon

customer_reviews.title: Quality leather belt
customer_reviews.text: Quality belt. This version is well built but not extremely built so it probably wouldn't be good for any heavy belt items but there are other Hanks belts for that. For an everyday belt this is great. The only thing I would personally get rid of is the buckle roller, unnecessary IMO and just rattles and makes noise.
customer_reviews.author: Kingston73

customer_reviews.title: Great quality belt!
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best belt I've ever owned. I will definitely buy another one soon, in brown. Great workmanship, unbelievably sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Strelitzer

customer_reviews.title: Great for ccw
customer_reviews.text: I like the belt very much just wish I had ordered one the next size wider but this one is very sturdy great for ccw
customer_reviews.author: andy Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great Belt.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing belt. Very well made and good quality leather. Perfect for a holster or just to keep your britches up. Their customer service is also top notch and will follow up to make sure you are happy with your purchase. If I could give more than 5 stars I would. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Gray Ghost

customer_reviews.title: Quality craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and handles my IWB holster very well. I feel confident my holster will stay where it is and will function as it should. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tarheels55

customer_reviews.title: Beast of a belt.  I want another.
customer_reviews.text: Solid belt. Easy to slip on. Very sturdy. Not a girly-mans belt.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W.

customer_reviews.title: Seems expensive but worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Did not believe it but exceptional product
customer_reviews.author: MLS

customer_reviews.title: Great product, nothing to dislike.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, well crafted belt. Strong materials. Very satisfied. I expected it to be a little wider but this is a great item. If I ever need another I would not hesitate to purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up any better than a $19 department store belt
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing, it seemed sturdy but it quickly became soft and flexible, more so than the $19 belt I have had for 15 plus years.
customer_reviews.author: 13FerdST

customer_reviews.title: YOU WONT FIND BETTER QUALITY FOR THE PRICE AND YOU WONT NEED ANOTHER ...
customer_reviews.text: AS A RETIRED POLICE OFFICER I ORDERED THE 1 1/2 BELT TO CARRY MY GLOCK 27 OR 22 WITH MAGS. YOU WONT FIND BETTER QUALITY FOR THE PRICE AND YOU WONT NEED ANOTHER BELT UNLESS YOU ARE A LION TAMER. NOTE; I WEAR 36 PANTS AND ORDERED A 40 BELT AS RECOMMENDED, BUT BECAUSE OF THE THICKNESS OF THE BELT I SHOULD HAVE ORDERED THE 42.
customer_reviews.author: 2007 BEACHBUM

customer_reviews.title: Durable looking product
customer_reviews.text: Great looking belt! Appears to be able to hold up to everyday use and carrying any side arm. My belt has 8 holes allowing for wide range of sizing to fit specific application of the day. Ordered size by chart and had good fit. Once buckled with out a holster, I had 4 more holes for expansion. Not sure if you may want to add 2 inches to length if primarily carry inside waistband. Stiffness may relax a little but I prefer it to prevent sagging without over tightening.
customer_reviews.author: Sean L

customer_reviews.title: Good American made product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the belt for the past nine months. There has been little wear and tear. I did have to add a hole because it wasn't tight enough. Other than that I have no complaints. I don't use it for concealed carry. I need a good belt for work. I have my radio holder on one side and two key ring holders on the other side. Normal thickness belts would be worn out after six to nine months because of the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Bates

customer_reviews.title: VERY THICK
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased this as a gift for my husband who needed a CCW belt. It is super thick, so much so that fitting into normal belt loops is a challenge. He was not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: S. K.

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully crafted; solid leather and nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: This belt is solid leather with nice fittings. It holds my holster very well, and it's so nice I'll wear it for everyday use. I wanted a CCW belt that doesn't look like I'm wearing tactical clothing, I think that's a give-away that one is carrying, and this belt is just the thing. Solidly made and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Capone

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: This is the second belt that I have purchased. Now I have one that is black and another that is brown. Built to last. Customer service is the Best!
customer_reviews.author: PolishBob

customer_reviews.title: very flimsy belt
customer_reviews.text: not a carrying belt at all ! very weak almost like rubber not stiff leather
customer_reviews.author: Jenn891

customer_reviews.title: Quality material, so far so great!
customer_reviews.text: This belt is excellent! I put it on as soon as I received it and it's always on. It can be used on your everyday clothes, as well as your dress clothes. I wasee using regular department store belts and they would eventually get damaged. This looks to be strong enough for the long run. Really well made, and impressive. Cheaper than a lot of the other ones I've seen on Amazon and other outlets. Don't look any further, buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Works for me.
customer_reviews.text: This a very sturdy belt. It adjusts easily and holds up every holster I have used with it. 3 years later the black is not scuffed and the belt has not lost it's form. Great with jeans, shorts and cargo pants. A little too thick for some dress slacks.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B.

customer_reviews.title: Hanks Belts
customer_reviews.text: Just go my belt today and I can't believe how good the quality is. I have owned many belts in my life time, but I have never had a belt of this quality before. It is thick and the advise on sizing was spot on. I know where I will buy all of my belts in the future!!! Top notch communication from the seller as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gtp01

customer_reviews.title: Excellent belt
customer_reviews.text: Excellent belt. The quality is very good and the fit is good. I have a 36 inch waist and I bought the 40 I have two holes to grow lol. Bought this to put my holster for a vaquero revolver on. It's a very sturdy belt I am happy with purchase and if you are looking for quality you won't be disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Notphoto

customer_reviews.title: Finally a Real CCW Belt
customer_reviews.text: Wow...Awesome belt, great company. The company was reaching out to me through out the delivery process and encouraging me to reach out to then with any issues
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Fernandez Jr

customer_reviews.title: and it's solid and comfortable. Two of those days included about 200 miles ...
customer_reviews.text: I opened the package, a long put off purchase...and wow. This is the thickest leather I have seen. I have spent far more and not gotten a belt this solid. Three days in, G19 IWB, and it's solid and comfortable. Two of those days included about 200 miles on my motorcycle. this is my new favorite belt at first glance.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Buysalot

customer_reviews.title: Excellent belt!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this belt. As advertised, it's extremely hefty and well crafted. I liked the price. And support is a real plus! It nice to have sellers actually CARE that you have a great experience with their product. I'll be buying the brown version soon!
customer_reviews.author: R. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat price/quality!
customer_reviews.text: Had to wear this for a few weeks to give a fair review. I have had a lot of "heavy duty" belts from Timberland, Levi's, etc. but I must say that so far, this is by far the best belt I have ever had. My waist is 34" - 35" and I bought a 40" belt, which is just perfect fitting. Right after receiving this I put on a thin layer of mink oil and let it sit over night to sink in. Next morning I wiped it dry and belt was left nice and smooth. Fair price for an excellent product - made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: Hans C. Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: He loved it so much
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the quality of this belt, plus the guarantee it has. He loved it so much, he immediately purchased another in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Quality gun belt
customer_reviews.text: Great belt so far. It’s thick, hold my holster pretty well. Nice to touch, easy to put off and off. Just wish I ordered a size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Martlet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Belt
customer_reviews.text: Finally a belt that is worthy of an excellent review. This one is very thick leather and very heavy and durable buckle that I have been searching for many years. I would definitely buy this again. Be sure to check the size chart. I bought size 40. My pants waist size is 36.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Conyngham

customer_reviews.title: Great product / Great Customer service/ correct sizing
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and size correct to the measurement. I have a 36" and it showed a 40 when ordering a 36. I know people hate ordering on line going through the hassle of return. There customer service is second to none. It's refreshing to see a company believing in most of acting upon it. I know what company I will refer my friends to....
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY recommended
customer_reviews.text: Do not mistake this belt for a flimsy department store belt. It is made to be strong and durable, as such it will need to be broken in like a well built pair of boots. Great product, great customer service, and made in America at a great price. Most companies should take notes.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Mayton

customer_reviews.title: Really fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough about this belt and this company, belt is everything I imagined it would be and the delivery was phenomenal. - I ordered it on Friday and it came Monday. Study enough to hold a side arm on one side and a two climb ho,der on the other. Balanced wright and no drooping ... fantastic. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hume

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty belt
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy and works great as a belt. No sag and holds my .45 well.
customer_reviews.author: Mario B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome belt
customer_reviews.text: These folks pay attention to their craft. The leather and buckle are top notch (see what I did there?) and I really like that the fasteners for swapping buckles are so easy to use yet secure. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, sturdy belt
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. I've only worn the belt a few times now, but it's already becoming one of my favorites. It's holding up very well and I especially like the classic look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best belt. Best price!!!
customer_reviews.text: My first new gun belt in 10 years and after only 1 day I know I made the right choice and bought a High quality gun belt that will last a long time. This belt is heavy duty and is high quality. If your looking for a new heavy duty belt made in the USA this is the belt for you, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Cooper

customer_reviews.title: So very much worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I love this belt. I got the 40 for 36. It's perfect for iwb carry with my sub contact. Even without carrying it's a great belt. I know what I getting my dad this Christmas and another for me too. Also, before I even got home to try the belt, I received an email with very easy return instructions for the seller. As far as I can tell this is an awesome product with awesome customer service.
customer_reviews.author: christopher wales

customer_reviews.title: Great Belt Best I own
customer_reviews.text: Great belt have worn a few weeks and it is comfortable and looks like it will last for a long time. I conceal carry a weapon always along with a magazine for MY GLOCK. No problem holstering great belt.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G.

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought years ago.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome belt!! Holds up to all my pistols! Even putting 2 on just to see if it would. Only belt I will ever need!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great belt!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made and sturdy belt. Plenty thick. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sprague

customer_reviews.title: Awesome looking belts
customer_reviews.text: Belts look sturdy and very well made. Wearing them will determine the true rating.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Mogab

customer_reviews.title: Top quality belt
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best quality belt I've ever purchased. I bought it sized up for a gun belt, but wear it for regular use mostly. I'm so impressed with it that I'm going to order a second one in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: justin heitz

customer_reviews.title: Great belt. I had to use blue painters tape ...
customer_reviews.text: Great belt. I had to use blue painters tape to keep from marring the fasteners, in order to change the buckle. No big deal. Lay the belt down with the fastener on a table and press down. Use a bit of emery cloth if necessary for grip.
customer_reviews.author: allnitelong

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BELT
customer_reviews.text: Wish i would have heard about Hanks years ago, I could have had a great belt way back when. As soon as i put it on, I knew this is a great product. MAKES a BIG difference when carrying on the job. I give it a 10 plus for quality, craftsmanship, and know i will get many years of good use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality belt
customer_reviews.text: Great quality belt. Looks nice and feels like it will last awhile due to the overall thickness and feel of the leather. I generally wear a 36 and got a 40. Personally, I wanted more notches so I called to exchange for a 42. Exchange was easy and the rep on the phone was nice and helpful over the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Treyes

customer_reviews.title: Buy this belt now!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my husband!! In 12 years of marriage this is the first gift he actually likes!!! Amazing quality!
customer_reviews.author: amber golden

customer_reviews.title: Great quality made belt!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two belts. The black belt was a little big on me so I returned it. I guess it's out of stock for my size. So I will repurchase when they're some smaller sizes. But other wise the belt is definitely quality!
customer_reviews.author: Cedric T.

customer_reviews.title: Very solid belt!
customer_reviews.text: I tried on the belt with several holsters as soon as I got it. This thing is built solid! Can't wait to start using it. I'd recommend going a size larger than you think, since there are more than enough buckle holes if you need them.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew G

customer_reviews.title: Nice belt,  would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my man. He loves it. Uses it everyday with a different belt buckle.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent belts, great company!
customer_reviews.text: So far my impression of the belt is that it is real good quality, and will last me many many years. They also have excellent customer service! I ordered the wrong size (my fault) from Amazon and Hanks exchanged it for me for free! They even paid the shipping both ways! I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: David N.

customer_reviews.title: Great Belt!!!
customer_reviews.text: Belts fits perfectly. Has a stiff feel to it so it holds my CCW firmly. I have a 36 inch waist and the size 40 belt works fine. I would recommend this belt highly.
customer_reviews.author: TJF

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough for ccw.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good belt and you can tell it's very well made, but it's not sturdy enough for small concealed handguns such as the S&W shield or the XDS. Anything smaller like a bodyguard might be fine, but my shield sags something fierce with the belt. Needless to say I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Tygorshkey

customer_reviews.title: Best belt I’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, will definitely last a lifetime. Survived my puppy chewing on it.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Totally awesome product that exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Totally awesome product that exceeded my expectations. I will be making more purchases in the future and recommending them to my family and friends. Delivery was fast and their instructions on sizing and care are great.
customer_reviews.author: G|P

customer_reviews.title: Great belt
customer_reviews.text: This belt was more comfortable than I expected . The only complaint I have is with myself I should have purchase this belt SOONER. Also I want to thank your company for your concern as to the fit and being ready to accept a return for the belt. I'm going to pass the good word and hope you get many happy customers. I'll be buying a second belt . Thanks, Richie
customer_reviews.author: Richie

customer_reviews.title: It's a excellent belt, very well made
customer_reviews.text: It's a excellent belt, very well made. It's not heavy but has great support. It looks more expensive than it is. It works with all of my holsters as well. I just ordered another belt in oak color.
customer_reviews.author: George U.

customer_reviews.title: exceptionally good leather and is the best belt I have found
customer_reviews.text: The Hanks Concealed Carry belt is thick, exceptionally good leather and is the best belt I have found. Great for all but dress slacks (a little too wide at 1-1/2"). Hanks has a belt for dress slacks that I will be ordering. Made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn's thoughts

customer_reviews.title: BUT THEY WILL NOT find anything like this anywhere else
customer_reviews.text: This is the by far the most awesome--BEST belt I have ever owned. I know some people , in their reviews say the belts are a bit "pricey"...BUT THEY WILL NOT find anything like this anywhere else......I'm buying one for my son tonite...and I just bought one for my wife.... This belt is AWESOME !!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry M.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and craftsmanship in a product is key
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered the belt I thought the belt had a steel core it did not. I am in law Enforcement and am a CCW I need a very strong belt to hold my gear. I will keep the belt but will not be ordering anymore from hanks. Very disappointed. Steel core is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Henry Jr

customer_reviews.title: It will do the job... But there are nicer looking gun belts
customer_reviews.text: Heavy sturdy belt will do what it's designed to do to support a firearm. the finish on the belt leaves a little bit to be desired it's a little rough looking.. it's not polished and the edge's looks a little unfinished
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Best belt you'll ever own.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality, extremely​ thick and durable, fitment was spot on using the chart. I seriously doubt you could find a better belt than this at any price. Made in USA.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT HARTMAN

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking, heavy duty belt
customer_reviews.text: Top Quality materials! I am very impressed with the quality of this belt, and it was a perfect fit. The sizing information provided was exact and quite helpful. I will definitely be purchasing from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great belt for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Carrying my gun holster and magazine. Very well built. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: emma haines

customer_reviews.title: The last belt you will ever buy. You get what you pay for. Highly recommend this item!
customer_reviews.text: This item is just what I expected! This belt is substantial and will last forever. I highly recommend this item if you are looking for a solid platform for any holster.
customer_reviews.author: Gary J Smith

customer_reviews.title: Return customer
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Hanks belt grate product holds up well over time with no sagging
customer_reviews.author: Lee Lowenstein

customer_reviews.title: This belt is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great belt if you want something basic and tough. It's plain enough to wear every day and nice enough to use as a dress belt. Leather measures .200"-.215" with my calipers and overall weight is 9.75 ounces. It is really difficult to find quality belts at the store these days. For the price of two or three low grade belts that will wear out in a year you can have this and be done.
customer_reviews.author: David Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Great holster belt!
customer_reviews.text: Great belt. Not for wearing with a suit! Perfect as a belt for a holster. Top quality. I am very impressed with the suppleness and strength. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Inquiring Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great CCW Belt
customer_reviews.text: Seems great! Sturdy! Prompt delivery. I’ll wear on Monday and bet it will be perfect! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Scott Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great durable quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, it is well made and it will be enjoyed for many years. Only thing and it’s on me, I didn’t realize how thick the belt was.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Cotroneo

customer_reviews.title: Love this belt
customer_reviews.text: This belt is softer than I expected and in so very comfortable. Have only had the belt a month and no sag from CC.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony C. Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: A Great Belt - Made to Last
customer_reviews.text: This belt made actually made me happy. Who would think a belt would make you happy. It is made very well and I received multiple emails from customer service if the belt was as expected and to contact them if there were any issues. Great service and a great belt. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good choice. Like the roller on the belt buckle
customer_reviews.text: Good choice. Like the roller on the belt buckle. Makes feeding easier, and less pinch on the belt. Could be a little thicker, but as it is, very good.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome belt.
customer_reviews.text: This belt was purchased for my husband. He is extremely satisfied and says, "This is what a belt should feel like. The warranty is a huge plus , along with being made in the U.S A."
customer_reviews.author: CJH

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable. Wore with a board-short type material shorts
customer_reviews.text: First belt was almost too small, Hank's got me a bigger size within a few days. Wore all day yesterday while working on the house, very comfortable. Wore with a board-short type material shorts, held my Glock 19 with full magazine up fine.Recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: SMasherella

customer_reviews.title: It fits good. I'm supper happy i found Hanks Gunner on ...
customer_reviews.text: Made in the USA, and the belt is well worth the cost. It fits good. I'm supper happy i found Hanks Gunner on line.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rod

product_meta.title: Hanks Gunner - USA Made Concealed Carry CCW Leather Gun Belt - 100 Year Warranty - 14 Ounce
product_meta.description: HANKS GUNNER GUN BELT DESIGNED FOR CONCEALED CARRYSimply put, the best value in a CCW belt on the market today. SPECS1.5" WidthRemovable Roller BuckleChicago ScrewsUSA madeLEATHER14oz Full Grain 1 piece leather.22"-.23" as measured with electronic caliper gauges: This can vary along the length of the belt as we do not level the hides used in the belts. Leveling is the process of running the hides through a machine to remove excess thickness for a uniform thickness. We leave these hides at their natural thickness.USA Made of USA leatherVegetable tannedHeavy duty100 YEAR WARRANTYHanks Belts are made from the finest Full Grain leathers and never processed or bonded leather. This results in a strong belt that will never crack or break! If it does send it back and we will replace it no questions asked...for 100 years*!*What we can't cover:If you gain or lose weight and your belt no longer fits.Damage caused by your pet. Dogs love to chew leather so keep your Hanks Belt safe from Fido!It's that simple!GET OUT THERE AND PUT YOUR HANKS BELT TO THE TEST!
feature_bullets: THICK & DURABLE GUN BELT - MADE IN THE USA OF USA LEATHER - 100% American - 100% Quality - GUARANTEED NO BREAK BELTS! Made by Skilled Craftsmen our USA made belts are here to stay. When you need a tough belt for CCW wear, that won't break the bank, this is it, the Hanks Gunner Gun Belt. Our solid leather belts will anchor your holster improving your ability to access your firearm.

100% FULL GRAIN LEATHER -ONE PIECE - NO FILLERS- These ccw belts will never split like some cheaper belts will - Made from 100% Full-Grain leather, the Gunner can take anything you throw its way and will continue to look great with age. Full Grain leather is the top layer of the hide which is the toughest part, making this concealed carry belt indestructible

14OZ LEATHER - 1.5" WIDE - Vegetable Tanned leather. Approximately .22-.23 thick No Sag, No Rollover, No Stretching we guarantee it! So add that extra ammo, your mag light and whatever else you might need for everyday carry. These belts are built to last and last they will. Removable buckle is fastened with removable Chicago Screws instead of snaps so the buckle can easily be changed,the last thing you will have to worry about is a snap that could break, because there are none!

100 YEAR WARRANTY - yep that's right we are so confident in our shooting belts we have your back for 100 years! This belt will not break and if it does, send it back, we'll get you another one, for free! The quality of our belts are unsurpassed.
100% FREE EXCHANGES IF NEEDED! If you have any questions please contact us. We are here to help
